Requests.acceptDescription: Accept the request to share your resume.
Requests.denyDescription: Deny request to stop sharing your resume.
Requests.acceptRequest: When you receive a request, you can accept or deny the request When you accept the request you are sharing your resume details. You can also control the accessibility of your resume. Just by Clicking on the deny button you can stop sharing your resume information with the requester.
Requests.receiveRequests: Get profile clicks, receive connection requests.
Requests.receiveRequestsSubText: This feature allows users to receive requests when others request on your profile

Prospects.mailDescription: Mail your prospect regardless of approval.
Prospects.acceptApproval: This feature gets enabled only on Approval of your request.
Prospects.viewApprovals: View approved Resume upon request approval
Prospects.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your prospect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

Reviews.viewApprovals: View your requested Resume on approval of your request
Reviews.checkApprovals: On approval of your request, view the resume of the requested ones. You can view their resume just by clicking on VIEW RESUME button. You can contact your prospect regardless of approval. You also get a passcode. You can use this passcode in order to view the resume. For example, visit on your requested profile. Click on View Resume button. Enter the shown passcode and you can view the resume.

Home.description: Create a resume in under 10 minutes to get your dream job.
Home.title: Private and secure by design
Home.subTitleOne: Fully control who can access your resume. Your resume is hidden from all by default.
Home.boldParagraph: You can set it public if you are actively looking or let other request access to view your resume approaching you for a position.
Home.subTitleTwo: We value your time and we make sure you are not bothered by anyone unless you want them to.
Home.quote: We shouldn't need to pay to keep our profiles private, our data is ours.
Home.titleText: Resumes created to be reviewed efficiently
Home.secondaryParagraph: Resumes are meant to be short and precise. LeetCV gives you the tools to write and let reviewers review efficiently.
Home.alt: Resumes are meant to be short and precise. LeetCV gives you the tools to write and let reviewers review efficiently.

HomePage.description: Craft a resume in just 10 minutes and share a personalized link with recruiters for an impeccable and streamlined experience.
HomePage.introHeading: Resume that is searchable and sharable. Giving you complete control over who has access
HomePage.resourcesTools: Share and receive review from your peers privately!
HomePage.resourcesParagraph: Building a resume is organic, sharing it with your peers in the industry and getting feedback to polish your resume is the best way to stay up to date with the current treads of the industry.
HomePage.sampleEmail: Enter your email address and We will give you a free trial for 7 days.
HomePage.pricingBudget: All features that give you privacy, collaboration and customization are free
HomePage.pricingEverything: Everything and more, unlimited access to all our features.
HomePage.testimonialsTitle: Some kind words from early customers...
HomePage.testimonialsParagraph: I worked with a small group of early access customers to make sure all of the content in the book was exactly what they needed. Hears what they had to say about the finished product.
HomePage.author: Design
HomePage.authorTitle: A single modern resume design for all industries and job levels
HomePage.authorPara: Design of our resume is influenced by thousands of resumes we have reviewed across multiple industries.
HomePage.blockquote: This method of designing icons is genius. I wish I had known this method a lot sooner.
HomePage.heading: Get lost in the world of icon design.
HomePage.paragraph: A book and video course that teaches you how to design your own icons from scratch.
HomePage.tableOfContentHeading: Get a look at all of the content covered in the book. Everything you need to know is inside.
HomePage.tableOfContentDescription: ‚ÄúEverything Starts as a Square‚Äù is comprised of 240 tightly edited, highly visual pages designed to teach you everything you need to know about icon design with no unnecessary filler.
HomePage.testimonialComment: How fast I got a resume ready with LeetCV was astonishing
HomePage.name: Nihar Nandan
HomePage.screencastsHeading: Build a resume that can land you a job rapidly
HomePage.screencastsDescription: Cutting edge SEO design allows your resume remains private while we allow Search engines to pick up your skills location and preference to get highlighted in searched
HomePage.pricingDescription: Your path to success starts here with our premium plans.
HomePage.title: Home | LeetCV
HomePage.homeDescription: Create a stunning resume in under 10 min. Continuously seek feedback & update with industry trends to stand out.
HomePage.craftResume: Our AI helps you craft the perfect resume in minutes! Get customized templates, real-time feedback, and insider tips to make your resume stand out!

Stats.title: People are building their LeetCV, build yours.
Stats.paragraph: Actively updating your resume with your achievements and keep it relevant enables you to land relevant jobs.

JobAgent.jobAgentTitle: Super powered Agents to search and automatically apply
JobAgent.jobAgentDesc: Our advanced AI Job Search agent, scrapes all your favorite company job posting and automatically uploads your LeetCV directly into jobs that meet your requirements. Use our AI to automate your job search in a few clicks.

RecruiterAgent.recruiterAgentTitle: AI Recruiter who screens resumes with you !
RecruiterAgent.recruiterAgentDesc: Upload resumes you want to screen and just give our AI Recruiter Agent a goal and fit details. Our AI does the rest to find the best fitting candidates for your criteria saving you hours and days of work.

Settings.resumePrivacyDescription: A private resume is a confidential document containing your professional qualifications and experiences, typically not shared publicly.
Settings.claimHandleDescription: Modify your username to personalize your online identity. Select a username that mirrors your identity and is easily recognizable by others.
Settings.tokenDescription: Tokens unlock premium features for perfecting your AI-generated resume. Upgrade to LeetCV Premium or Pro Plans for more tokens and additional benefits.
Settings.planUserDescription: Tokens are your key to accessing these premium features. With tokens, you can refine and optimize your AI-generated resume to perfection.
Settings.privateLinkDescription: Create a private, secure link to share your professional resume with specific people or organizations, keeping it confidential and not public.
Settings.syncDescription: Effortlessly sync your LeetCV data across devices and platforms to maintain current professional information for easy career management.
Settings.unsubscribeDescription: Opt-out of our services by unsubscribing. This action will remove your access to LeetCV features. Please be aware that unsubscribing is a permanent decision and cannot be undone.
Settings.addSecondaryEmailDesc: Add a secondary email to ensure continuous account access, especially if your primary email becomes restricted by your institute or college. Once added, you'll receive a recovery code to your email, so keep it safe for future account recovery.
Settings.recoverOldAccountDesc: To recover your old account, enter the recovery code and associated email. Once initiated, your current resume will be replaced with the old account's resume. This action is irreversible.

AiResumeBlog.title: Revolutionizing Resume Creation with AI Technology
AiResumeBlog.description: Embrace the future of job applications with the power of artificial intelligence.
AiResumeBlog.introDescription: In today‚Äôs rapidly evolving job market, standing out from the crowd with a polished and professional resume is more important than ever. Leveraging AI technology, our platform transforms the traditional resume building process into an innovative, dynamic, and highly effective experience. Discover how our AI-powered tools can make a significant impact on your job search and career development.
AiResumeBlog.understandingAiResumeDesc: AI-powered resume builders utilize sophisticated algorithms to analyze and understand your professional background and career objectives. These tools are designed to optimize your resume by highlighting your strengths and aligning your experiences with the requirements of potential employers, ensuring that you make a strong impression in every job application.
AiResumeBlog.howItWorks: How Our AI Resume Builder Works
AiResumeBlog.howItWorksDesc: Our platform is simple yet powerful. Start by entering your personal and professional details into our user-friendly interface. The AI then processes this information, using natural language processing and machine learning techniques to structure your data into a cohesive and attractive resume format. It also recommends specific wording, skills, and achievements based on your industry and job title, significantly enhancing the effectiveness of your resume.
AiResumeBlog.advancedDesc: Crafts a resume that reflects your unique professional profile and career aspirations.
AiResumeBlog.timeEfficiencyDesc: Reduces the time spent on drafting and refining your resume, allowing you to apply to more jobs faster.
AiResumeBlog.strategicDesc: Enhances your visibility to Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), increasing your chances of securing interviews.
AiResumeBlog.dataDrivenDesc: Uses data insights to improve the overall quality and impact of your resume.
AiResumeBlog.futureOfResumeDesc: The integration of AI into resume building is just the beginning. Future enhancements will include more personalized feedback, integration with job boards to tailor resumes for specific postings, and even interactive tools to simulate and prepare for interviews. The potential for AI in career development is limitless, promising even more innovative ways to enhance your job search in the coming years.
AiResumeBlog.conclusion: We hope this exploration of AI-powered resume building has illuminated its potential to transform your job search. Keep an eye on our blog for more updates on how AI continues to revolutionize professional development tools. Empower your career journey with our cutting-edge technology designed to set you up for success.

ConvertResumeBlog.title: Transforming Your Career with Our Resume Conversion Tool
ConvertResumeBlog.description: Upgrade to the new era of professional resumes with our state-of-the-art conversion tool.
ConvertResumeBlog.introDescription: As career landscapes evolve, so does the format of effective resumes. Our Resume Conversion Tool breathes new life into your outdated resumes, transforming them into modern, impactful documents that capture the attention of today's recruiters.
ConvertResumeBlog.whyConvertDesc: In the digital age, the first impression is often digital. Traditional resume formats may not highlight your strengths effectively in today's automated job market. Our tool not only updates the visual layout but also enhances the content to meet current standards and increases compatibility with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
ConvertResumeBlog.howItWorksDesc: Upload your old resume, and our AI examines its structure, content, and design. The AI then restructures it, suggesting enhancements and modernizing its design based on the best industry practices and the latest trends. You can review and personalize the suggestions before finalizing your new resume.
ConvertResumeBlog.keyBenefits: Benefits of Using Our Resume Conversion Tool
ConvertResumeBlog.professionalAppealDesc: Automatically updates the format to a cleaner, more professional design that stands out.
ConvertResumeBlog.contentOptimizationDesc: Enhances your content to align better with your career goals and target job descriptions.
ConvertResumeBlog.atsCompatibilityDesc: Increases your chances of being shortlisted by optimizing for ATS without compromising on aesthetics or readability.
ConvertResumeBlog.quickTurnaroundDesc: Converts your resume quickly, allowing you to apply for that dream job almost immediately.
ConvertResumeBlog.futureOfResume: Embracing the Future of Resume Building
ConvertResumeBlog.futureOfResumeDesc: As the job market continues to change, staying ahead with a resume that meets professional trends is crucial. Our Resume Conversion Tool ensures that your credentials are presented in the most favorable light, empowering you to secure the opportunities you deserve.
ConvertResumeBlog.conclusion: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their resumes and careers with our tool. Ready to make a change? Try our Resume Conversion Tool today and step into the future of professional documentation.

CoverLetterBlog.title: Crafting Professional Cover Letters with AI
CoverLetterBlog.description: Perfect your job application with a tailor-made cover letter that stands out.
CoverLetterBlog.whyCustomCoverLetter: Why a Custom Cover Letter Matters
CoverLetterBlog.whyCustomCoverLetterDesc: A cover letter is more than just a formality; it‚Äôs a personal introduction and a critical component of your job application. A well-crafted cover letter highlights your relevant experiences, aligns your skills with the job requirements, and expresses your enthusiasm for the position and the company, setting you apart from other applicants.
CoverLetterBlog.aiDrivenCoverLetter: Introducing Our AI-Driven Cover Letter Builder
CoverLetterBlog.aiDrivenCoverLetterDesc: Our AI-driven Cover Letter Builder simplifies the creation of personalized cover letters. By inputting details such as job position, experience, and company name, our AI analyzes and generates a compelling cover letter that reflects your professional persona and directly addresses the specifics of the job description.
CoverLetterBlog.howItWorksDesc: Simply enter the required job details into our platform, and our AI will take over. It uses advanced algorithms to craft cover letters that are not only structured professionally but also include key phrases and elements that are likely to resonate with employers and recruitment software alike.
CoverLetterBlog.keyFeatures: Key Features of Our Cover Letter Generator
CoverLetterBlog.personalizationDesc: Automatically customizes each letter to reflect the job you‚Äôre applying for.
CoverLetterBlog.atsFriendlyDesc: Optimized to increase your chances of passing through Applicant Tracking Systems.
CoverLetterBlog.downloadableDesc: Easily download your cover letter in various formats ready for submission.
CoverLetterBlog.speedDesc: Generates letters quickly to help you meet application deadlines without sacrificing quality.
CoverLetterBlog.futureEnhancementsDesc: We are committed to continuous improvement. Future updates will include more customization options, integration with job search engines for instant application, and interactive features that guide users in refining their letters further based on feedback.
CoverLetterBlog.conclusion: Harness the power of AI to create cover letters that open doors to new career opportunities. Try our Cover Letter Generator today and step confidently into your job search with a professional edge.

ResumeIdeasBlog.title: Tailoring Your Resume with AI: A Step Towards Perfect Job Matches
ResumeIdeasBlog.description: Discover how our AI-driven technology provides custom resume suggestions tailored to specific job descriptions.
ResumeIdeasBlog.customizedEnhancementsDesc: In the competitive job market, a one-size-fits-all resume doesn‚Äôt cut it. Our AI-driven tool analyzes the job description you‚Äôre targeting and offers tailored suggestions to align your resume perfectly with potential employer expectations.
ResumeIdeasBlog.howItWorksDesc: Input the job description into our system, and our AI evaluates your existing resume against it. It identifies skills and experiences you possess that match the job‚Äôs requirements and suggests areas for improvement or emphasis to enhance your resume‚Äôs impact.
ResumeIdeasBlog.intelligentMatchingDesc: Our AI not only matches your skills with the job requirements but also suggests ways to rephrase and reorder your resume content for optimal relevance. This ensures that your application stands out and aligns more closely with what recruiters are looking for.
ResumeIdeasBlog.customizationDesc: After tailoring, download your updated resume ready for submission.
ResumeIdeasBlog.compatibilityDesc: Ensures your resume is compatible with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
ResumeIdeasBlog.convenienceDesc: Quickly apply to jobs with a resume that‚Äôs fine-tuned to meet specific roles.
ResumeIdeasBlog.futureOfAI: Looking Ahead: The Future of AI in Resume Building
ResumeIdeasBlog.futureOfAIDesc: We are continuously enhancing our AI to offer more precise and effective resume modifications. Future updates will include deeper integration with job databases and real-time feedback from industry professionals to further refine your resume‚Äôs effectiveness.
ResumeIdeasBlog.conclusion: Leveraging AI to fine-tune your resume could dramatically improve your job search outcomes. Embrace the future of personalized job applications with our advanced resume improvement tool and secure your ideal job position more efficiently.

InterviewGuideBlog.title: Mastering Job Interviews: A Comprehensive Guide
InterviewGuideBlog.description: Navigate your next job interview with confidence using our detailed guide.
InterviewGuideBlog.introDescription: Interviews can be daunting, but with the right preparation and mindset, you can turn them into opportunities to showcase your skills and fit for the job. Our comprehensive interview guide covers every aspect of the interview process, from preparation to follow-up, ensuring you're well-equipped to impress potential employers.
InterviewGuideBlog.preparingForTheInterviewDesc: Preparation is key to a successful interview. This section covers essential steps such as researching the company, understanding the job role, and preparing your answers to common questions. Learn how to make a positive first impression and set yourself up for success.
InterviewGuideBlog.duringTheInterviewDesc: Learn what to expect during the interview itself. This includes tips on effective communication, body language, and how to handle different types of interview formats, from phone and video interviews to in-person meetings.
InterviewGuideBlog.commonInterviewQuestionsDesc: Get familiar with questions commonly asked during interviews. This section provides sample questions and advice on how to answer them effectively, highlighting your qualifications and enthusiasm for the role.
InterviewGuideBlog.postInterviewFollowUpDesc: Understand the importance of following up after the interview. This section offers guidelines on writing a thank-you note, reiterating your interest in the position, and maintaining a professional relationship with your interviewer.
InterviewGuideBlog.researchCompanyDesc: Gain insights into the company‚Äôs culture, mission, and recent achievements to tailor your responses and show genuine interest.
InterviewGuideBlog.practiceAnswersDesc: Rehearse answers to common questions and scenarios to build confidence and improve your delivery.
InterviewGuideBlog.dressProfessionallyDesc: Choose appropriate attire that aligns with the company‚Äôs dress code to make a strong visual impression.
InterviewGuideBlog.stayCalmDesc: Manage your nerves with relaxation techniques and focus on presenting your best self during the interview.
InterviewGuideBlog.futureOfInterviewsDesc: Explore how technology is shaping the future of interviews, from AI-driven assessments to virtual reality simulations. Stay ahead of the curve with insights into emerging trends and how to prepare for them.
InterviewGuideBlog.conclusion: We hope this interview guide equips you with the knowledge and confidence to excel in your next job interview. Stay tuned to our blog for more career advice and tips on navigating the job market successfully.

JobSearchTipsBlog.title: Effective Job Search Strategies: Tips for Success
JobSearchTipsBlog.description: Optimize your job search with our expert tips and strategies.
JobSearchTipsBlog.introDescription: The job search process can be challenging, but with the right strategies and mindset, you can navigate it successfully. This comprehensive guide offers practical tips and advice to help you find your next opportunity, from crafting the perfect resume to acing the interview.
JobSearchTipsBlog.resumeAndCoverLetter: Crafting Your Resume and Cover Letter
JobSearchTipsBlog.resumeAndCoverLetterDesc: Your resume and cover letter are your first impression with potential employers. This section provides tips on how to make them stand out, including formatting, key content to include, and common mistakes to avoid.
JobSearchTipsBlog.networkingDesc: Networking is a powerful tool in the job search process. Learn how to effectively leverage your professional network, both online and offline, to uncover job opportunities and gain valuable insights into potential employers.
JobSearchTipsBlog.onlineJobPortalsDesc: Discover the best online job portals and how to use them effectively. From setting up job alerts to optimizing your profile for search engines, this section covers everything you need to know about online job hunting.
JobSearchTipsBlog.interviewPreparationDesc: Preparation is key to a successful interview. This section offers tips on researching the company, practicing your responses, and presenting yourself confidently during the interview.
JobSearchTipsBlog.setGoalsDesc: Define what you are looking for in a job and set realistic goals to keep your search focused and efficient.
JobSearchTipsBlog.stayOrganizedDesc: Keep track of job applications, follow-ups, and networking activities to ensure you don't miss any opportunities.
JobSearchTipsBlog.followUpDesc: Always follow up after submitting an application or attending an interview to show your interest and professionalism.
JobSearchTipsBlog.continuousLearningDesc: Stay updated with industry trends and continuously improve your skills to make yourself a more attractive candidate.
JobSearchTipsBlog.futureOfJobSearchDesc: Explore the future trends in job searching, including AI-powered job matching, virtual job fairs, and remote work opportunities. Stay ahead of the curve with insights into how technology is transforming the job market.
JobSearchTipsBlog.conclusion: We hope these job search tips help you navigate the job market more effectively. Keep an eye on our blog for more career advice and resources to support your professional journey.

ChatGptJobGuideBlog.title: Harnessing ChatGPT: A Comprehensive Guide to Job Search and Interview Preparation
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.description: Discover how ChatGPT can assist you in every step of your job search and interview preparation.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.introDescription: In the modern job market, leveraging advanced tools like ChatGPT can significantly enhance your job search and interview preparation. This guide explores how to use ChatGPT effectively to craft resumes, write cover letters, search for jobs, and prepare for interviews, making your job search more efficient and successful.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.usingChatGptForResumeDesc: Learn how to utilize ChatGPT to create a professional and polished resume. From structuring your work history to highlighting your key skills, ChatGPT provides personalized advice and examples to help you stand out to potential employers.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.coverLetterWritingDesc: Discover how ChatGPT can help you craft compelling cover letters tailored to specific job applications. Get tips on how to convey your enthusiasm, align your experience with the job requirements, and make a strong case for why you‚Äôre the ideal candidate.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.jobSearchStrategiesDesc: ChatGPT can assist you in developing effective job search strategies. Learn how to identify the best job portals, set up job alerts, and customize your applications to match job descriptions, maximizing your chances of landing interviews.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.interviewPreparationDesc: Prepare for your interviews with confidence using ChatGPT. Practice common interview questions, receive feedback on your responses, and get advice on body language, dress code, and other crucial aspects of the interview process.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.personalizationDesc: Use ChatGPT to tailor your resume and cover letter for each job application, ensuring they align with the specific requirements and culture of the company.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.practiceMakesPerfectDesc: Regularly practice interview questions with ChatGPT to build confidence and improve your answers.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.feedbackLoopDesc: Incorporate feedback from ChatGPT into your job search and interview preparation to continually improve your approach.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.stayUpdatedDesc: Use ChatGPT to stay informed about the latest trends in job searching and interview techniques to stay ahead of the competition.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.futureOfChatGpt: The Future of ChatGPT in Job Searching
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.futureOfChatGptDesc: Explore the future potential of ChatGPT in the job market, including more advanced personalized advice, real-time job matching, and enhanced interview simulations. Stay ahead with insights into how AI continues to evolve in career development.
ChatGptJobGuideBlog.conclusion: We hope this guide helps you leverage ChatGPT to enhance your job search and interview preparation. Stay tuned to our blog for more tips and strategies on navigating the job market with cutting-edge technology.

CaseStudiesBlog.title: Real-World Success: Case Studies on Online Resumes, Job Searches, and Interviews
CaseStudiesBlog.description: Explore how individuals successfully navigated the job market with innovative strategies and tools.
CaseStudiesBlog.introDescription: Case studies provide valuable insights into the strategies and tools that have helped job seekers succeed. This guide showcases real-world examples of how online resumes, effective job search techniques, and thorough interview preparation have led to career success.
CaseStudiesBlog.onlineResumeSuccessDesc: Discover how individuals have leveraged online resume tools to create standout resumes. Learn about their challenges, the solutions they used, and the outcomes they achieved.
CaseStudiesBlog.jobSearchStrategiesDesc: This section highlights various job search strategies that have proven successful. From utilizing job portals to leveraging social media and networking, learn from real-life examples.
CaseStudiesBlog.interviewPreparationDesc: Explore case studies on how thorough interview preparation has led to job offers. See the methods used for practice, research, and follow-up that made a difference.
CaseStudiesBlog.personalizationDesc: Tailoring resumes and applications to match job requirements significantly increases success rates.
CaseStudiesBlog.technologyAdoptionDesc: Utilizing AI tools and online platforms can streamline the job search process and enhance the quality of applications.
CaseStudiesBlog.networkingImportanceDesc: Building and leveraging professional networks can uncover hidden job opportunities and provide valuable industry insights.
CaseStudiesBlog.continuousImprovementDesc: Regularly updating skills and staying informed about industry trends can keep job seekers competitive.
CaseStudiesBlog.futureTrendsDesc: Explore upcoming trends in job searching, including the increased use of AI, virtual reality in interviews, and more personalized job matching services.
CaseStudiesBlog.conclusion: We hope these case studies provide inspiration and practical insights for your job search journey. Stay tuned to our blog for more success stories and tips to help you achieve your career goals.
